attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a gas chamber and crematorium at Springfield hospital tooting. The gas chamber is for less serious heretics but the crematorium is where people are burned alive for heresy. These victims of Britain’s penal system are paralysed first by a knife through the brain stem so their brain is cut off and then they are burned alive.

 

Many others are being lobotomised and tamed as household pets or factory slaves. There are high level and low level lobotomies giving more than one level of disability.

 

I ask you to make these practises as unlawful as an inhuman and unnatural punishment and in most cases the victims have committed no crime except heresy or blasphemy and are burned to save their souls.

 

Please come and remove the people who commit these crimes against humanity. 
 

It is also English law. So we must repeal the blasphemy and anathema and heresy laws.

We must allow any religion or none as lawful.

 

Our religious leaders are criminals.
 

Let’s make Britain a democracy! End psychiatry today! Disestablish the church and the crown! Invoke the Parliament act! Dispossess the aristocracy and make Britain a democracy like America.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
